item.description:
Approx 1000 ft gain, < 2.5 mi hike. NOTE CHANGE OF DATE DUE TO INCLEMENT WEATHER!

We'll meet at the north end of the parking lot of 45 Lyme Rd office bldg behind Coop Market on Rt 10 in Hanover and leave from there @ 5:30pm in a  carpool/caravan to north end of the Dartmouth Skiway parking lot in Lyme. We'll depart on foot from the  Skiway parking lot to the trailhead  (corner of Dorchester Rd. & Grafton Pond Rd; approx .2 mi from Skiway lot) to begin our hike @6:00pm. Let us know if you plan to meet us at the trailhead rather than in Hanover so we won't look for you in Hanover.

(Please note that parking at the Dorchester Rd. intersection across from the trailhead is no longer permitted.)

We have a good shot at being down before sunset, but a headlamp is always a good idea on an evening excursion into the woods. My dog will be along, other friendly dogs are welcome.

Food/drink in Hanover afterwards pending interest of the group.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Holt's Ledge AT, Lyme NH
